trans-unit.source: Provides the context for validation of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce il contesto per la convalida di una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that owns the property.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyOwner" /> is a null reference (Visual Basic <see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyOwner" /> è un riferimento null ( <see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that owns the property
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene la proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.PropertyValidationContext" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="propertyName" /> is a null reference (Visual Basic <see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="propertyName" /> è un riferimento null ( <see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> associated with this instance as an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> .
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> associata a questa istanza come classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> associated with this instance as an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> .
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> associata a questa istanza come classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> .

trans-unit.source: Gets the property name associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della proprietà associato all'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The property name associated with this instance.
Get the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which owns the property associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene la proprietà associata all'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which owns the property associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che contiene la proprietà associata all'istanza.
